alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 7:55PM CDT until August 13 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bourbon County in southeastern Kansas... Crawford County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 754 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bronson, or 12 miles east of La Harpe, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pittsburg, Fort Scott, Frontenac, Girard, Arma, Marmaton, Cherokee, Mulberry, Chicopee, Mccune, Franklin, Bronson, Arcadia, Uniontown, Walnut, Fulton, Redfield, Hepler, Mapleton and Burgess. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
